mapper.select:
select a.id,a.company_id,a.name,b.name as companyName,a.loginname,b.begintime,b.endtime,sum(c.pc_client) as pcClientCount, sum(c.staff_client) as staffClientCount,sum(c.boss_client) as bossClientCount,sum(c.device_client) as deviceClientCount,a.createtime from bd_company_user a left join bd_company b on a.company_id=b.id left join bd_shop c on a.company_id=c.company_id
a.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or b.name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
a.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.dr=0
GROUP BY a.id,a.company_id,a.name,b.name,a.loginname,b.begintime,b.endtime,a.createtime
